Over the course of the next few pages, you will complete the setup of a virtual machine on your own computer (the host machine). Be sure to follow all the instructions in the order presented.

- [Creating the Virtual Machine](04 Creating the VM.html)

- [Installing the Virtual Machine](05 Installing the VM.html)

- [Creating a Shared Folder](06 Creating a Shared Folder.html)

- [Installing Tools on VM](07 Installing Tools on VM.html)
